data.name: KIDDO
data.detailed_description:
KIDDO is a point & click adventure game full of puzzles with a distinct beautiful hand-drawn style and an ironic sense of humor.
The story follows the life of Kiddo, a socially isolated person, who has hit rock bottom.

Years and years had passed and you are still there, sitting on your sofa wasting your life away.
You have lost everything you once had. No motivation, no friends, no job and your house is falling apart.
But not everything is lost, there is still someone that cares about YOU no matter what.
Would you be able to get up and start again? Are you ready to give it another chance?
Come on Kiddo!

This game is for YOU if:
-You are bored
-You like unexpected puzzles and challenges
-You like a good story
-You like old school hand-drawn aesthetics
-You have been in the dark hole

data.short_description: KIDDO is a point & click adventure game full of puzzles with a distinct beautiful hand-drawn style and an ironic sense of humor. The story follows the life of Kiddo, a socially isolated person, who has hit rock bottom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

data.legal_notice: KIDDO and all KIDDO characters are property of Grasita Games
